alert.note: Alert for Upper Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 12:42AM AKST until January 10 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Strong winds with blowing snow, low visibility and cold wind chills occurring. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Expect visibilities to be reduced at times to one half mile. Wind chills of 45 below. * WHERE...Summits along the Dalton Highway and in the surrounding uplands. * WHEN...Until noon today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills as low as 45 below zero will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. Winds gusting to 45 mph will begin to diminish late this morning. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
